title: #128: Dark Winter with Abby and Robbie Martin
description: Welcome to another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. First off, Sam introduces everyone to Tin Foil Hat's new tech guy to the show who runs the board and helps with the visuals, Xajavier G!  Then he welcomes  from the Empire Files, Abby Martin and her brother from Very Heavy Agenda, Robbie Martin for their first podcast together.  On this episode we discuss the 2001 Anthrax scare and the Dark Winter simulation drill.  This episode is insane!  Thank you so much for all of your support.
